Perceptor::

"Yes master"replied Perceptor by comm link after that he looked 
towards Skulletron and Drillbit and said "Follow me" 

Then he walked towards the entrace of Predacon's base


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Megatron / Switchblade --
> 
> Megatron looks amused as Flicker explains his plan to infiltrate 
the 
> Maximal base. "Interesting, very interesting. Quickstrike and 
> Inferno will escort you two to the control room for futher analysis 
> of your plan," He nods to Inferno and Quickstrike, "I have a few 
> other things to take care of before anything is decided."
> 
> He turns to the still open entrance to the Predacon base, and yells 
> out to Skulletron, Wolfenstein, and Perceptor. "PERCEPTOR, BRING 
> SKULLETRON AND WOLFENSTEIN INTO THE BASE." He stands beside the 
> corridor entrance that he'd come from, waiting for Perceptor to 
> bring the two bots into the base.
> 
> -----------------------------
> 
> Switchblade wanders around through the walls and cicuitry of the 
> base. He knew most of the base, but he hadn't taken the time to 
> totally memorize the inner parts of the base. He'd arrive at the 
> control center. It was just a matter of when. (heh a delay post =p)
